ai-patthana21.53:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.53:0.3_0: used to be attached to cling, and so on.
ai-patthana21.53:1.1_0: Not grasping does not give rise to repulsion. ...
ai-patthana21.53:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
